servinfo.title: Main Fuel Level Sensor Removal and Installation

item.ptxt: Do not touch resister plate (1) and deform arm (2). It may cause main fuel level sensor to fail.
Be very careful not to cause damage to fuel tube installed section (sealed section in bore). If it be damaged, replace it with new one, or fuel will leak from the part.

s1.ptxt: Remove fuel pump assembly from fuel tank referring to Fuel Pump Assembly Removal and Installation:F9Q .
Disconnect main fuel level sensor connector (3).
With pressing snap-fit part (2), remove main fuel level sensor (1) by sliding it in the arrow direction as shown in figure.
